features: 【Comfortable and Breathable】Our COOLZU balaclava face mask is made of premium ice silk with moderate thickness and features high-elastic, it is soft, skin-friendly brings comfortable and smooth to the touch, also durable and easy to clean. Furthermore, the excellent sweat absorption performance helps to keep cool while wearing in summer and keep warm in winter.

【Versatile Wearing Ways】COOLZU's Neck gaiter face mask is suitable for both men and women. There has a variety of ways to wear, such as a face mask, headband, hat, scarf, head cover, pirate, neckerchief, beanie cap, hood, balaclava and other ways of wearing you like.

【One Size for All】Ergonomic bandana face mask design won’t cause discomfort or sultry feeling when worn on, as it is not too tight nor too loose, the extended fabric with good stretchy and high elasticity suitable for most men and women head size, which can fix the COOLZU's gaiter mask in the right place and not easy to slide down.

【Full Protection】This bandana COOLZU face mask has sun UV protection that helps to protect your face from sun exposure and burns. Also features wind-proof and sand-proof to prevent wind and sand from blowing into your ears, nose, and mouth. And ideal protective equipment for windy and sandstorm areas in summer and autumn.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: COOLZU Balaclava & Face Mask Designed For Everyone Outdoor Health and Sports Who Enjoys Life! COOLZU Face cover scarf mask is our newest developed product, It can be worn all year! Use the ice silk fabric, it is soft cooling and comfortable, and close to your skin, Windproof and dustproof, With extra layer of warmth to protect against cold wind. With active ingredients to protect against UV-sun. Keep you cool in summer and warm in winter.For Various Occasions: outdoor running, cycling or riding a motorcycle. at the gym, on a run, yoga... Also a good companion for travel, walking, yoga, fishing, climbing, hiking, skiing and so on. And suitable for use in various music festivals or theme parties. put it on, you will have a happy outdoor experience!

Can Be Worn All Year Round! For Summer: face mask, headband, rag, helmet lining, hairband, ponytail, scarf, etc. With active ingredients to protect against UV rays, sun, wind, dust and insects.For Winter: neck protector, face mask, brimless beanie, balaclava mask. With extra layer of warmth to protect against cold wind.

Versatile Wearing Ways It can be used for different ways what you like and meet your different needs,such as headband, hair belt, neck gaiter, face cover, sun shield, collar scarf, helmet lining, beanie, hand warmer, sports scarf, helmet liner, wristband, etc.You can wear it to do more things, such as fishing, skateboard, skiing, hiking, running, cycling, painting, camping and other outdoor activities.

Super Elastic Features 4-way stretch, Super stretchy fabric that accommodates most head sizes, There will be no urgency to wear it, not fall off. Soft & Comfortable Breathable Made of premium ice silk with moderate thickness and features high-elastic, it is soft, skin-friendly brings comfortable! High-precision Technology Overlock stitching process, delicate stitches, soft and close to the skin, also durable and easy to clean.

Full Protection Strong protection: anti-sand, anti-dust, anti-ultraviolet, moisture-proof and breathableQuick-dry breathable poly-spandex fabric, wicking seeat and quick dryingBreathable 4 way stretch material, comfortable to wear, not easy to slip

As a Best Gift The best gifts in these holidays for family & frends: New Year’s Day, St. Valentine’s Day, All Fool’s Day, Easter, Arbor Day, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Labor Day, Halloween, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas gift.Your best partner for most outdoor activities. Whatever you do and wherever you go , just take it to prevent sunburn effectively. A versatile hat. This will be the best care for family and friends.
Can Also Be Used To Wear For Daily Clothes Matching.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable, warm, light weight, and they can be worn as neck warmers and not only face gaiters… i use these to run by the ocean in winter and they work well and very lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and comfy
reviews.reviewText: Love these, best I have had ,will order again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin but good quality
reviews.reviewText: A little thinner than I was expecting. Material is polyester I think, not super soft. Stretchy and comfortable and keeps just enough warmth in while being breathable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy comfortable material

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: La tela es demasiada suave y fresca

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps My Neck Protected From Sun
reviews.reviewText: I take these to work everyday. I tend to work outside from time to time and I’m conscious about my skin being exposed to the sun for too long. After a while I can feel my skin burning up which is why I wear long sleeves in the summer time to help keep me cooler and not burn up however my neck would totally be left exposed to the sun. Not anymore. I actually wear two of these neck gaiters at the same time for double protection and I appreciate that these are great at catching my sweat. I look like I don’t sweat out there and when a nice breeze comes through and my gaiter is nice and sweaty my neck feels cool. These work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Kind of thin
reviews.reviewText: These are extremely lightweight, which makes them very compact. They block some wind, but are not particularly warm. I have had other buffs that were much more comfortable.
